description: A pun on a common saying, turned into a website name.
title: Eye Punned
n_1: Sam squints at his computer screen, rubbing his eyes.
n_2: Liz smirks as she watches Sam's reaction.
c2_2: It's a site for sore eyes!
n_3: Sam bursts out laughing at the pun.
c2_3: I knew you'd see the fun in it!
n_4: They continue laughing over more eye puns.
